apple_vendor_description: This emoji, as presented on Apple devices, features a man with a warm medium skin tone distinguished by a vibrant shock of red hair. Appleâ€™s characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give his hair a lustrous appearance, with individual strands subtly defined. The soft rounded edges of his facial features create a friendly and approachable look, conveying a sense of personality and individuality with a touch of playful spirit.
